Player History
Drafted in 25th round, 393rd overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2015...
Injured on 4/10/2015 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 7/11/2015, off Charles Bodkin (COL)...
Drove in 6 runs against Detroit on 8/28/2015...
Hit first career homerun on 6/8/2016, off Jorge Rubio (ATL)...
Injured on 6/4/2017 with a Bruised Neck, out for 4 days...
Traded from Philadelphia to St. Louis (C) on 7/5/2017 (Going to STL: SS Robert Broaddus, CF Joel Williams. Going to PHI: P Roque Fons)...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
